name: Ziggy's Chase
description: Never mind the plumber, the hedgehog is coming to Steam! THE GAME FEATURES CLASSIC GAMEPLAY, AND VR MODE AS WELL.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel i3 / AMD FX Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel i5 / AMD FX Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 Storage: 400 MB available space
